title: Create a Brand Profile for your TTO account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TTO Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: brand_name
parameters.description: Brand name. Length limit: 60 characters. Note : Once set, this field cannot be updated.

parameters.name: brand_industry_id
parameters.description: The ID of the brand industry. For enum values, see Brand Profile industry IDs . Note : Once set, this field cannot be updated.

parameters.name: brand_website
parameters.description: Brand website link. The link should start with https:// .

parameters.name: logo_url
parameters.description: The URL of the brand logo image. Specification requirements: File format: JPG, PNG, or GIF. Aspect ratio: 1:1. File size: Up to 5MB. Note : Once set, this field cannot be updated.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: brand_profile_id
fields.description: The ID of the created Brand Profile.

fields.name: brand_industry_id
fields.description: The ID of the brand industry.

fields.name: logo_url
fields.description: The URL of the brand logo image for your TTO Creator Marketplace account. Note : This URL is system-generated for the logo image and is different from the URL specified through logo_url in the request for Brand Profile creation.
